metadata.title: CVE-2023-6159 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from12.7 prior to 16.6.6, 16.7 prior to 16.7.4, and 16.8 prior to 16.8.1 It waspossible for an attacker to trigger a Regular Expression Denial of Servicevia a `Cargo.toml` containing maliciously crafted input.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
